text: Viking Press (formally Viking Penguin, also listed as Viking Books) is an American publishing company now owned by Penguin Random House. It was founded in New York City on March 1, 1925. It was bought by the Penguin Group in 1975. ==References== Category:1925 establishments in the United States Category:1920s establishments in New York (state) Category:Publishing companies of the United States Category:Companies based in New York City
title: Viking Press
